document.full_text: nortel networks corp, the fallen canadian telecom giant, said it had received court approvals for the "stalking horse" bid made by a unit of google inc for its portfolio of technology patents for $900 million.
document.title: nortel gets court nods for google's "stalking horse"
lines_and_colors: nortel networks corp, the fallen canadian telecom giant, said it had received court approvals for the "stalking horse" bid made by a unit of google inc for its portfolio of technology patents for $900 million.
